bibl.title: Notes on the Kingdom of the Blemmyes.
bibl.note: The Blemmyan occupation of the Dodekaschoinos between the end of the 4th and the middle of the 5th cent. A.D., and the period of the Blemmyan settlement on the island of Tanare / Temsir (Gebelen?) in the first half of the 6th cent. A.D.
bibl.seg: Török László, Notes on the Kingdom of the Blemmyes.
Studia in honorem L. Fóti = Studia Aegyptiaca 12 (1989) pp. 397-412.
